mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_phone_number, member_identity_number, member_registered_date, member_email) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberIdentityNumber}, current_timestamp(), #{memberEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_id = #{memberId}, member_password = #{memberPassword}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_phone_number = #{memberPhoneNumber}, member_identity_number = #{memberIdentityNumber}, member_email = #{memberEmail} WHERE member_id = #{previousId}
